articles.author: Denise Wee
articles.title: UBS's Khan Vows Retention Packages for Credit Suisse Asia Staff - Bloomberg
articles.description: UBS Group AG wealth boss Iqbal Khan told Credit Suisse Group AG staff in Asia that retention packages could come as soon as next week, according to people familiar with the matter, as the bank seeks to prevent an exodus of top talent.
articles.content:
